nvidium.options.automatic_memory_limit.t: Automatically determines the memory limit to set given the amount of available VRAM on your system
nvidium.options.max_gpu_memory.name: Max GPU memory
nvidium.options.max_gpu_memory.tooltip: Max GPU memory allowed, will start to cull chunks if this limit is hit
modmenu.summaryTranslation.nvidium: Uses NVIDIA-exclusive OpenGL mesh shaders and GPU's VRAM to significantly improve perfomance.
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.nvidium: Replaces Sodium rendering backend with use of NVIDIA-exclusive OpenGL mesh shaders and direct access to GPU's VRAM. This allows you to increase the render distance and improve performance.
